short_summary: Requirement to supply, deliver, and install a training engine at Atlantic Stadacona in Halifax
description: The Department of National Defence requires a training engine for the Royal Canadian Navy.
full_summary:
====== ### **Training Engine Tender Announcement** #### Funding Authority Details -------------------------------------------------------- **Title/Description (English/French):** W0103-239267_B - Training Engine Moteur d’entraînement - W0103-239267_B **Reference Number/Numero de Reference:** WS3553235511-Doc3698023861 **Solicitation Number/Numero de Sollicitation:** WS3553235511 #### Tender Details -------------------------------------------------------- * **Title:** Training Engine * **UNSpsc Code/HauteurATS Code:** * UNSPSC: 25111900 * *Marine craft systems and subassemblies Systèmes et sous-ensembles pour embarcations* * **Procurement Category/Catégorie d’approvisionnement:** Goods - Government Direct (GD) * **Notice Type/Nature de l’avis:** Request for Proposal (RFP) * **Selection Criteria/Criteres de sélection:** * Not Applicable (Sans Objet) * **Procurement Method/Méthode d’approvisionnement:** Competitive * **Trade Agreements/ Accords commerciaux:** * Canadian Free Trade Agreement * **Region of OPportunity/Région d’intervention:** None * **Region of Delivery/Région de livraison:** Nova Scotia #### Timeline -------------------------------------------------------- * **Publication Date/Date de publication:** 6 Octobre 2022 * **Tender Closing Date/Date de clôture de soumission:** 25 Octobre 2022 à 14h00 * **Expected Contract Start Date/Date de début contractuelle prévue:** 8 Novembre 2022 * **Expected Contract End Date/Date de fin contractuelle prévue:** 31 Mars 2023 #### Contact Information --------------------------------------------------------- **Contracting Authority/Entité contractante:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 **Contractor Contact/Contact de l’entrepreneur:** Clara Dumay clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ### **Note** -------------------------------------- This tender announcement has been declared cancelled.
Good luck! I have used my 400
